feature_specification.title: User Profile Customization
feature_specification.description: Allow users to customize their profile with themes and layouts.

user_stories.story: As a user, I want to select a theme for my profile so that it reflects my personality.
As a user, I want to rearrange the layout of my profile to suit my preferences.

acceptance_criteria: Users can select from at least 5 themes.
Users can drag and drop elements to rearrange their profile layout.
